abstract: But the smallest of small businesses still struggled to get credit.
snippet: But the smallest of small businesses still struggled to get credit.
lead_paragraph: The Small Business Administration did record business in 2011, guaranteeing more money in loans to small companies than in any year in its history. But the very smallest businesses, seeking the smallest loans, had more trouble getting an S.B.A. guarantee than in 2010.

headline.main: S.B.A.-Backed Lending Set a Record in 2011
